startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Direct Avvo lawyer directory URL to scrape from (e.g., https://www.avvo.com/bankruptcy-debt-lawyer/al.html).

maxLawyers.title: Maximum Lawyers
maxLawyers.description: Maximum number of lawyer profiles to scrape. Default is 20 for faster testing; increase for production runs.

maxListingPages.title: Maximum Listing Pages
maxListingPages.description: Maximum number of listing pages to crawl (e.g., 10 pages Ã— 5 lawyers/page = 50 total results).

includeReviews.title: Include Reviews
includeReviews.description: Fetch additional review-related details from profile pages. Enabling this will visit individual profile pages and may slow down runs.

includeContactInfo.title: Include Contact Information
includeContactInfo.description: Fetch additional contact details from profile pages (email, phone, office address). Enabling this will visit individual profile pages and may slow down runs.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for bypassing anti-bot protection. Highly recommended for reliable scraping.
